intro: Cnestis foliosa, commonly known as the leafy cnestis, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its palmate leaves, which are divided into several lobes, giving it a distinctive appearance. It produces small, white or pale pink flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant is often found in moist, shaded environments and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
